variables.name: ash_admin_password
variables.description: String: Administrator password of emulated ASH host vm.

variables.name: ash_vhd_source_uri
variables.description: String: URI of the downloaded OS-disk VHD.

variables.name: ash_number_of_cores
variables.description: String: Number of cores in the ASH host vm - usually 32 or 48.

variables.name: ash_create_managed_identity
variables.description: Boolean: Create (true) a user defined managed identity or ingest (false) an existing one.

variables.name: ash_existing_managed_identity_name
variables.description: String: Name of existing managed identity to ingest.

variables.name: ash_existing_managed_identity_rg
variables.description: String: Resource group containing the existing managed identity to ingest.

variables.name: ash_create_key_vault
variables.description: Boolean: Create (true) a key vault or ingest (false) an existing one.

variables.name: ash_existing_key_vault_name
variables.description: String: Name of existing key vault to ingest.

variables.name: ash_existing_key_vault_rg
variables.description: String: Resource group containing the existing key vault to ingest.
